sentences: Elu läheb vihaseks kui keegi muutub vihaseks.
Vihastama panema, vihale ajama - see tähendab, et elu saab täis.
Niisugune sigadus ajab elu täis ja teeb inimesed vihaseks.
context: The Estonian word 'vihaseks' means 'into an angry person' or 'to make angry'. It appears to be a form of the verb 'vihastama' (to become angry) in the illative case, indicating movement into or becoming something. The phrase 'elu läheb vihaseks' means 'life becomes full/angry', suggesting that life becomes difficult or frustrating when people get angry. This word is used to describe the state of being made angry or the process of becoming enraged.
